page.title: 16POSTAL SERVICES
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE ARE 4 SUB POST OFFICES AND 15 WALL AND PILLAR BOXES. ONE SUB POST OFFICE IS QUITE NEAR TO OUR SCHOOL SO WE INTERVIEWED THE SUB POST MASTER. HE SAID THAT THE SUB POST OFFICE HAD BEEN CONVERTED FROM A PRIVATE HOUSE IN 194O AND HE HAD WORKED THERE WITH ONE PART-TIME ASSISTANT FOR THE LAST 18 YEARS. HE SAID HE WAS ALWAYS WORRIED ABOUT ROBBERY AND BURGLARY AND THAT SINCE HE HAD TAKEN OVER THERE HAD BEEN ONE CASE OF ROBBERY THERE. HE WASN'T ALLOWED TO TELL US HOW MUCH MONEY PASSED THROUGH THE OFFICE BUT IN THE LAST 1O YEARS THE WELFARE STATE AND THE GIRO BANK HAD INCREASED THE WORK CONSIDERABLY, THE BUSIEST SERVICE BEING THE PAYMENT OF PENSIONS AND ALLOWANCES.
